column4: is there a way to make a bootable backup (on a second hard drive) of the currently running system, without booting into clonezilla or similar? something like carbon copy cloner (OS X) or The Best Disk Cloning App for Windows DriveImage XML (Windows)?
If the file-system in use supports snapshots, you can use that
ext4 had snapshot support added last year
ok, thanks. I'll look into that.
